subject: Nested Suites in Ant/JUnit
msgSnippet: I am trying to write a formatter for Ant/JUnit task that prints the full hierarchy of suites, like SwingUI, but only the topmost suite seems to show up. Can
messageBody:
I am trying to write a formatter for Ant/JUnit task that prints the
full hierarchy of suites, like SwingUI, but only the topmost suite
seems to show up. Can someone confirm this? If true, any idea why?

Thanks
David
